data.details: Jonas visits Angelica as she is about to commit suicide.
Whispers visits Angelica simultaneously with Jonas, telling her she can't go through with the suicide. Whispers and Jonas cannot see each other.
Will hears the music Riley is playing in the club.
Kala hears rain and thunder from Wolfgang's grandfather's funeral.
The chicken Capheus receives as payment for a bus ride appears in Sun's office.
Riley finds herself in Nomi's place, with Amanita in the park during Pride.
Wolfgang hears the sirens from Will's police car as he's trying to open the safe.
Riley hears the clicking from the safe Wolfgang is trying to open.
Riley hears the sirens from Will's police car.
Riley finds herself in Will's body in Chicago as she gets high on DMT. Will sees her outside his car window.
Riley visits Will in the church Angelica killed herself, and they have a conversation.
Will visits Riley in London briefly as the men around her start shooting.
Capheus visits Nomi at the San Francisco Pride.
Nomi visits Riley in London as she is singing to herself, and Riley visits Nomi in the hospital in San Francisco.
Kala feels the heat from Wolfgang's vigorous sex.
Wolfgang strongly craves indian food due to the food at Kala's engagement party.
Wolfgang sees Kala while he's eating in a restaurant, and Kala sees him from her balcony.
Riley and Will see the other as their own reflection in the mirror.
Nomi hears knocks on her door in the hospital, that came from Riley's apartment.
Sun and Will, reading each their file, briefly see the other's file. Sun visits Will's apartment.
data.episodeName: Smart Money Is on the Skinny Bitch

data.details: Briefly visit each other when talking about betrayal.
data.episodeName: Smart Money Is on the Skinny Bitch

data.details: Visit each other when picking up handguns.
data.episodeName: Smart Money Is on the Skinny Bitch

data.details: Capheus visits Sun asking for help with the gangsters
data.episodeName: Smart Money Is on the Skinny Bitch

data.details: Sun controls Capheus to beat up the gangsters.
data.episodeName: Smart Money Is on the Skinny Bitch

data.details: In Nairobi, Will picks up the dropped gun while Capheus looks around the shooting range.
data.episodeName: Smart Money Is on the Skinny Bitch

data.details: While trying on shoes, Wolfgang's feet feel strange as Capheus walks through the forest.
At dinner with Felix, Wolfgang briefly hallucinates Nomi's wristcuffs from the hospital on his hands.
Will visits Sun as she is walking through the sex club and they both disarm the attacker holding a gun to Sun's head.
When speaking to another officer, Will says "it's good to see you" in Korean.
Will learns about visiting and steps in Jonas's cell. Jonas tells him to save Nomi.
Will watches Nomi be wheeled past him to surgery.
Kala briefly wakes up in Riley's bed and hears Riley's friend Shugs having sex.
everyone hears the song "What's going on?" as Riley plays it on her iPod and sings along.
visit each other while singing
Will wakes up in Nomi's body on the gurney, and uses the metal of the needle to unlock the handcuffs and help Nomi escape.
Lito experiences Sun's period cramps. Lito visits Sun's apartment and Sun visits Lito's trailer.
Riley visits Capheus in Kenya, and Capheus visits her in London. They remark on the wildly different temperatures.
Lito begins crying in his car, channeling Sun's distress. They visit each other's locations.
Will calls Nomi's mother, looking for information on her wherebouts. While speaking to her, he inhabits Nomi's body, and she hears what her mother is saying.
Kala's father cooks for her, and Nomi remarks that her coffee suddenly tastes much more sugary.

While Wolfgang is at a club and Kala is in her bedroom, they hear each other and understand what the other is saying, even though Kala is speaking Hindi and Wolfgang is speaking German. Kala recognizes Wolfgang's voice from the sing-along the day before but believes it was a dream. Wolfgang says "I can't see you" in Hindi.
When Will knocks on a suspect's door, he sees Lito instead. They visit each other's stressful situations- Will on the hunt for a perp, Lito while filming a shooting scene in his movie.
Visit each other while walking down the street in their hometowns, and understand each other despite speaking Swahili or Korean. They talk about their mothers and difficult choices ahead.
While walking to her wedding, Kala briefly visits Sun as she hands her dog to her teacher. Sun briefly sits in Kala's chair as she is carried to the wedding ceremony.
Wolfgang appears naked at the end of Kala's wedding ceremony, telling her she should not marry Rajan because she doesn't love him. She faints, then Wolfgang faints as well.
Will and Riley visit each other in bars in Chicago and London. Will enters his phone number and tells Riley to call him. The phone rings and they speak over the phone, proving the connection.
As Sun is about to turn herself in, she sees Nomi.
As Riley is being suffocated, Will takes over her body and fights off the attackers, simultaneously hitting and kicking police buddies at the bar he is actually in.
Wolfgang appears, again naked, in Kala's bed the next morning, and she accuses him of being a demon. He answers that he's wanted her from the moment he saw her, and he senses that she feels the same.
Have an orgy. WTF?
After almost dying, Riley visits Sun in prison. Riley is sitting in front of a stone bench that reads "I have conversed with the spiritual sun." Sun smokes a hash cigarette through Riley.
As Riley is looking out a plane window, Capheus leans over and exclaims, "Clouds!"
As Will looks inside the white van, he finds Angelica's body and her eyes suddenly open to look at him.

As Kala is praying to Ganesha, they meet once more, simultaneously outdoors in India and during a downpour at a cafe in Berlin. Wolfie asks if the connection is a miracle, and Kala says she believes that's the appropriate term.
Yrsa appears behind Riley to warn her, "You should not have come back", and disappears when Riley turns around
Jonas appears to warn Nomi that Whispers is coming.
Whispers controls Niles.
They both had the same feeling of "when everyone is laughing at the movies and you can't". Metaphorically for Nomi and literally for Kala
data.episodeName: We will All be Judged by the Courage of Our Hearts

data.details: Kala visits Wolfgang in the hospital where Felix is. Wolfgang talks about how he and Felix met and how close they are. Wolfgang mentions that he is a "brother by choice" which he says is much more stronger than blood.
data.episodeName: We will All be Judged by the Courage of Our Hearts

data.details: Riley visits Will's home. Will visits Riley's childhood home. They each mentioned thay they could visit each other's places.
data.episodeName: We will All be Judged by the Courage of Our Hearts

data.details: They each help other out in figuring out the connection of Whispers in the Biologic Preservation Organization (BPO) along with Dr. Metzger. They both bring up that what the other person's doing is illegal.
data.episodeName: We will All be Judged by the Courage of Our Hearts

data.details: Will is going to the Captain's room and can't help Nomi. Sun wakes up in her prison cell and controls Nomi's body for combat against BPO with help from Will's tactic. Nomi escapes.
data.episodeName: We will All be Judged by the Courage of Our Hearts

data.details: While on the chase, Nomi went inside a car but she doesn't know how to drive. Capheus takes over and controls the car and they escape.
data.episodeName: We will All be Judged by the Courage of Our Hearts

data.details: Riley walks in a cave and Yrsa visits her while simultaneously Riley visits Yrsa in her home.
data.episodeName: Death Doesn't Let You Say Goodbye

data.details: Will visits Jonas where he's held captive while Jonas visits Will at home.
data.episodeName: Death Doesn't Let You Say Goodbye

data.details: Riley visits Will at his home while he visits her in the cave.
data.episodeName: Death Doesn't Let You Say Goodbye

data.details: Nomi visits Lito at the museum while Lito visits Nomi in her trashed apartment.
data.episodeName: Death Doesn't Let You Say Goodbye

data.details: Riley visits Capheus in his bus while Capheus visits Riley at her family's tombstones.
data.episodeName: Death Doesn't Let You Say Goodbye

data.details: In Berlin, at the Holocaust Memorial, Wolfgang walks through tall concrete slabs while each of the others visit.
Will reads an inscription written in German.
Jonas visits Will in Millenium Park in Chicago while Will visits Jonas in captivity.
Sun walks past Wolfgang at the memorial.
Jonas visits Will in a rotunda.
Capheus sits next to Kala on a bench while Kala stands in front of a TV while Capheus sits on a couch wrapped in a blanket.
Lito looks at Wolfgang on the ground while Wolfgang also stands next to Lito looking at himself on the ground and Steiner.
In Chicago, Will carries a plastic crate on his shoulder while Riley stands ahead of him at the railing of a bridge while simultaneously Will visits Riley sitting on a couch.
Wolfgang extends his hand to Lito on the ground and tells him to get up.
Will watches fireworks as Sun and Capheus appear seated next to him looking up at the fireworks.
In the concert hall, Riley watches her father perform while each of the cluster appear in the concert hall and reflect on their respective births before Riley collapses.
In a hospital, Riley lies in bed while Yrsa appears over her.
data.episodeName: Just Turn the Wheel and the Future Changes

data.details: Will appears in Nomi's apartment and helps her plan how to save Riley.

data.details: Nomi and Will visit Riley in the hospital.
data.episodeName: Just Turn the Wheel and the Future Changes

data.details: Capheus and Sun punch her cell wall while Sun appears in the factory and controls Capheus to lean back and save him from being shot.
data.episodeName: Just Turn the Wheel and the Future Changes

data.details: Will controls Kala to back the Guru Yash against the wall.
data.episodeName: Just Turn the Wheel and the Future Changes

data.details: Will and Kala stand over Riley's hospital bed.
data.episodeName: Just Turn the Wheel and the Future Changes

data.details: Capheus tells Kala and Will that he thinks he's about to die.
data.episodeName: Just Turn the Wheel and the Future Changes

data.details: Will reaches out of the bus and disarms the gun man.
data.episodeName: Just Turn the Wheel and the Future Changes

data.details: Will looks down at Riley in the hospital as one medical professionals asks another if they've heard back from the neurologist who replies, "Not yet".
data.episodeName: Just Turn the Wheel and the Future Changes

data.details: Will asks Nomi in her apartment if she did that, who replies that it was easy, "Hacking's what I do"

data.details: Jonas, Will, and Nomi discuss Whispers knowing about Riley.

data.details: Will visits Riley on a gurney in a van and holds her hand.
At an airport, Nomi and Will walk together while in San Francisco Will talks with Nomi to plan how they will rescue Riley.
Yrsa visits Riley in the facility.
Will is driving and hears a gunshot at the facility.
Kala, Capheus, and Nomi watch Riley in the facility.
Will puts his hands on hers in the facility.
Will and Jonas drive in the sports car.
Will puts his hand on Wolfgang's shoulder from behind and warns him that he heard the shots and he knows the way a bullet sounds when it hits kevlar.
Wolfgang visits Kala in the lab while Kala cowers with Wolfgang behind the counter in Berlin.
In Berlin after Wolfgang shoots Sergei, tears well in Kala's eyes as Wolfgang tells her, "That's why you have to marry Rajan".
Will and Nomi drive in the sports car while visiting Nomi in San Francisco.
Nomi watches as Will tries to scan his phone to enter the facility in Iceland while Will visits Nomi in San Francisco.
As Whispers leans over unconscious Riley, Jonas whispers in Whispers' ear "You didn't expect this, did you?"
In the facility Lito appears and Will asks, "Do I know you?" to which Lito replies, "Yeah. We had sex."
Jonas, Will, and Nomi discuss Will and Riley's exit strategy.
Whispers leans over Jonas where he's held captive and asks where Mr Gorski is.
Jonas stands in the facility and watches Will from the balcony.
Nomi talks to Will as he swears about 4 guards when Sun appears to say, "Is that all?" before Sun and Will disarm them all.
Nomi and Kala help Will evade guards and wake Riley.
Capheus helps Will get the ambulance going without keys.
Whispers taunts Will as Will drives away in the ambulance.
Jonas tells Will it's over as Will drives in the ambulance.
Nomi asks Will how you're supposed to escape a helicopter when there's only one long road.
Whispers declares that Will "won't kill us all" and "You can't do it." as the helicopter and ambulance approach each other and Will replies, "Maybe I can't, but I know who can".
Wolfgang controls Will and speeds up towards the helicopter.
Jonas warns Will that he has very little time and that he'll find their cluster.
From the ambulance, Will visits Riley in the snow, asking her to save him and tells her he loves her.
On the boat, Riley injects Will and the rest of the cluster appear, watching them.
